title: An Act relative to establishing a special commission to study alimony

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Ramos of North Andover, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4046) of Adrianne Pusateri Ramos for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to the alimony system.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
